He suggested that other great repositories of culture-- the British Museum and New York's Metropolitan Museum of Art-- were equally vulnerable to plunder or destruction. It can happen to any place in the world, said Zahi Hawass , who faces demands for higher wages from antiquities workers who demonstrated outside his office this week.
